gameDetails.name: The 7th Continent: The Flying Roots
gameDetails.description:
The Flying Roots expansion includes 40 Cards and 6 Flying Roots figures.

This add-on’s effects are tied directly to the Action Deck.

When you begin a game including The Flying Roots, you add the Flying Roots cards to the action deck. When a Flying Root figure is on your Terrain card, if you draw one of these cards whilst attempting to resolve an action, a Flying Root will appear on your Terrain card. What do they do? You will have to research and observe them to find out!
